com.garygregg.coverity.codingtest.operation

Class ReportingOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.garygregg.coverity.codingtest.operation.ReportingOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryOperation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddOperation, DivideOperation, MultiplyOperation, SubtractOperation

    public abstract class ReportingOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements BinaryOperation
    Contains an operation with a print stream for reporting information.
    Author:
    Gary Gregg
